import React from 'react' import { Button, Form, Input } from 'antd' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import styled from 'styled-components' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { loginRequestAction } from '../reducers/user' const Title = styled.h3`` const MyButton = styled(Button)` margin-bottom: 10px; ` function LoginForm() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() const onFinish = (values) => { dispatch(loginRequestAction({ userId: values.userId, password: values.password, navigate })) } const onFinishFailed = (errorInfo) => { console.log('Failed:', errorInfo) } return ( <> 로그인
Login

) } export default LoginForm
